localised_text.text: Traverse towards the Forge of Souls
Enter the Land of the Plaguelord
Enter The Realm of the Sorcerer

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | InteractingNodeContext.TeleportationTemplateContext.Closable == false => "{{tr:cannot_close_realm_rift}}" | CanCloseTeleportationNode == false => Loc("character_cannot_close_rift") | CharacterContext.FactionContext.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(ClosureCost) == false && IsContextValid(ClosureCost) => Loc("rituals_ritual_status_insufficient_gold") | Loc("rifts_close_tooltip")

this | CanCharacterTeleport == false => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_rift") | InteractingNodeContext.TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord") => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_already_inside") | CampaignRoot.OpenTeleportationNodeList.Any(TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord")) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed") | PlayersFaction.PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne").Total == 1 && PlayersFaction.PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_nurgle").Total == 1 && PlayersFaction.PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_slaanesh").Total == 1 && PlayersFaction.PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_tzeentch").Total == 1 => Loc("rifts_forge_of_souls_realm_tooltip") | Loc("rifts_forge_of_souls_realm_tooltip_ai")

this | ScriptObjectContext("slaanesh_realm_offer_taken_" + PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key).NumericValue == 1 => Loc("realm_not_available_slaanesh_block") | CharacterContext.FactionContext.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(TeleportationCost(StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord"))) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed_not_available") | CanCharacterTeleport == false => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_rift") | InteractingNodeContext.TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord") => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_already_inside") | CampaignRoot.OpenTeleportationNodeList.Any(TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord")) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed") | Loc("rifts_khorne_realm_tooltip")

this | ScriptObjectContext("slaanesh_realm_offer_taken_" + PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key).NumericValue == 1 => Loc("realm_not_available_slaanesh_block") | CharacterContext.FactionContext.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(TeleportationCost(StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord"))) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed_not_available") | CanCharacterTeleport == false => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_rift") | InteractingNodeContext.TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord") => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_already_inside") | CampaignRoot.OpenTeleportationNodeList.Any(TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord")) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed") | Loc("rifts_nurgle_realm_tooltip")

this | ScriptObjectContext("slaanesh_realm_offer_taken_" + PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key).NumericValue == 1 => Loc("realm_not_available_slaanesh_block") | CharacterContext.FactionContext.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(TeleportationCost(StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord"))) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed_not_available") | CanCharacterTeleport == false => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_rift") | InteractingNodeContext.TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord") => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_already_inside") | CampaignRoot.OpenTeleportationNodeList.Any(TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord")) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed") | Loc("rifts_slaanesh_realm_tooltip")

this | CanCharacterTeleport == false => Loc("cannot_teleport_rift") | IsContextValid(StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNetworkNodeRecord")) == false => Loc("cannot_teleport_rift_no_rifts_available") | IsContextValid(TeleportationCost(StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNetworkNodeRecord").TeleportationTemplateContext)) && CharacterContext.FactionContext.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(TeleportationCost(StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNetworkNodeRecord").TeleportationTemplateContext)) == false => Loc("rituals_ritual_status_insufficient_gold") | InteractingNodeContext.TeleportationTemplateContext.Key.Contains("_neutral") => Loc("rifts_not_claimed") | Loc("rifts_traverse_tooltip")

this | ScriptObjectContext("slaanesh_realm_offer_taken_" + PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key).NumericValue == 1 => Loc("realm_not_available_slaanesh_block") | CharacterContext.FactionContext.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAfford(TeleportationCost(StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord"))) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed_not_available") | CanCharacterTeleport == false => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_rift") | InteractingNodeContext.TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord") => Loc("cannot_enter_realm_already_inside") | CampaignRoot.OpenTeleportationNodeList.Any(TeleportationTemplateContext == StoredContext("CcoTeleportationNodeTemplateRecord")) == false => Loc("realm_already_completed") | Loc("rifts_tzeentch_realm_tooltip")

Join(FactionList.Filter(IsHuman == false && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne"))).Distinct(CultureContext), FactionList.Filter(IsHuman && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne")))).Sort( PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_nurgle").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_slaanesh").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_tzeentch").Total )

Join(FactionList.Filter(IsHuman == false && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne"))).Distinct(CultureContext), FactionList.Filter(IsHuman && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne")))).Sort( PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_nurgle").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_slaanesh").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_tzeentch").Total )

Join(FactionList.Filter(IsHuman == false && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne"))).Distinct(CultureContext), FactionList.Filter(IsHuman && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne")))).Sort( PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_nurgle").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_slaanesh").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_tzeentch").Total )

Join(FactionList.Filter(IsHuman == false && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne"))).Distinct(CultureContext), FactionList.Filter(IsHuman && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne")))).Sort( PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_nurgle").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_slaanesh").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_tzeentch").Total )

Join(FactionList.Filter(IsHuman == false && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne"))).Distinct(CultureContext), FactionList.Filter(IsHuman && IsDead == false && IsContextValid(PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne")))).Sort( PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_khorne").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_nurgle").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_slaanesh").Total + PooledResourceContext("wh3_main_realm_complete_tzeentch").Total )

default.name: default
default.text: Select a Rift in order to traverse to it.
